akn:section.akn:heading: Sanctions and policy coordination for Burma

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The head of the Office of Sanctions Coordination in the Department of State should develop a comprehensive strategy for the implementation of the full range of United States diplomatic capabilities to implement Burma-related sanctions in order to promote human rights and the restoration of civilian government in Burma.
